entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.

text: @aravosis What is more disturbing than Trump’s rant is that FOX is defending  him and his approval rating is going up despite his now daily displays of dangerous incompetence and pernicious narcissism. Covid19 is not the only pathogen threatening this nation.
